items.title: S.E.C. Drops Case Against Cryptocurrency Firm Founded by Winklevoss Twins
items.content_html: The agency says that victims of an investment offering involving Gemini Trust got their money back, though after a regulatory action brought by the New York attorney general.
items.content_text: The agency says that victims of an investment offering involving Gemini Trust got their money back, though after a regulatory action brought by the New York attorney general.

items.title: Saudi Arabia-Backed LIV Golf to Hold Tournament at the Trumps’ New Jersey Resort
items.content_html: It will be the latest in at least half a dozen events that the breakaway league has held at Trump Organization resorts in the past four years.
items.content_text: It will be the latest in at least half a dozen events that the breakaway league has held at Trump Organization resorts in the past four years.

items.title: TikTok Updates Its Terms and Conditions in the U.S.
items.content_html: The changes came after the app’s Chinese parent company spun out an American entity to run TikTok in the United States.
items.content_text: The changes came after the app’s Chinese parent company spun out an American entity to run TikTok in the United States.

items.title: For His Next Act, Darren Walker Is Heading to Hollywood
items.content_html: Anonymous Content, a production company whose top investor is Laurene Powell Jobs’s Emerson Collective, has named Darren Walker as president and chief executive.
items.content_text: Anonymous Content, a production company whose top investor is Laurene Powell Jobs’s Emerson Collective, has named Darren Walker as president and chief executive.

items.title: Trump Wants U.S. Investment in Venezuela, but Sanctions Still Complicate It
items.content_html: With tight business restrictions still in place, companies may find it challenging to even assess what opportunities exist for them in the South American nation.
items.content_text: With tight business restrictions still in place, companies may find it challenging to even assess what opportunities exist for them in the South American nation.

items.title: For Greenland Tourism, Trump’s Interest Creates Uncertainty
items.content_html: Bookings to the island increased last year, and there are plans for two new airports. Threats from President Trump may change that.
items.content_text: Bookings to the island increased last year, and there are plans for two new airports. Threats from President Trump may change that.

items.title: Low Rates Sound Great. But a Trump Fed Could Cause a Painful ‘Sugar High.’
items.content_html: Dropping rates more than conditions warrant would stimulate the economy in the short term but could lead to trouble, our columnist says.
items.content_text: Dropping rates more than conditions warrant would stimulate the economy in the short term but could lead to trouble, our columnist says.
